cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.current_location: about 25 mi E of Wilmington, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to move slowly west across southeastern North Carolina, drift into eastern South Carolina, then curve northward across the western Carolinas and central Appalachians early next week
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Wilmington, NC (southeastern North Carolina coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC.  Storm Surge Watch: Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: South Santee River SC to Duck NC, including Albemarle & Pamlico Sounds.  Tropical-Storm Warning: Edisto Beach SC to Cape Charles Light VA and lower Chesapeake Bay.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primary impacts focused on the coasts of North Carolina and northeastern South Carolina
weather_observation.wind: Only a marginal (≤11%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusty squalls possible.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands may bring light to moderate showers but heavy rainfall totals are not anticipated.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and life-threatening rip currents along northeast Florida beaches due to long-period swells from Florence.
